text: @marcorubio Wrong!! We face a coronavirus because your President is lying to the public and downplaying it like it’s not serious! When the CDC spokespeople spoke, they had a very serious tone & told the public the truth  & how to protect ourselves. Trump should be Impeached for stupidity!
